data.title: Indian Television Academy Awards
data.text:
Annual awards for achievements in Hindi-language television

Not to be confused with Indian Telly Awards.

The Indian Television Academy AwardsCurrent: Indian Television Academy Awards 2023Awarded forExcellence in the Hindi television industryCountryIndiaPresented byIndian Television AcademyFirst awarded2001 ( )Last awardedpresentWebsiteOfficial websiteTelevision/radio coverageNetwork

Star Plus

Hotstar

Sony TV

Zee TV

Colors TV

Most recent ITA Award Winners

The Indian Television Academy Awards, also known as the ITA Awards, is an annual award ceremony organised by the Indian Television Academy to honour excellence in Hindi-language television and OTT platforms.[1]

The Indian Television Academy was launched in July 2001 by Anu Ranjan and the first ITA Awards were held in November 2001.[2]
